title: The Clockwork Archive
author: Mira Halden
summary: A young archivist discovers a hidden collection of mechanical tomes that can alter reality, pulling her into a struggle between ancient magical factions.

title: Shadows of the Iron Coast
author: Elias Renford
summary: A sailor journeys along a treacherous coast of abandoned forts and uncovers a conspiracy that could endanger his homeland.

title: Fragments of Tomorrow
author: Hana Lior
summary: After a global time-distortion event, several teens gain the ability to see possible futures and must choose which timelines to protect.
